duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct primary research on investment opportunities in the medical device arena
Perform analyses to evaluate market size, potential returns, and financial projections
Attend key industry conferences and develop networks with the clinical and investment communities
Source new investments and interface with management and other key ecosystem participants
Monitor progress of current portfolio by attending board meetings and analyzing presentations and financials

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate or graduate degree from leading program in finance, basic science or bioengineering (Master's preferred)
